articles.title: ‘We just do it’: Massachusetts plow drivers recount 24-hour shift during blizzard
articles.description:
Snow removal crews describe whiteout conditions, supply shortages, and 24-hour shifts after the Feb. 23 blizzard dropped up to 3 feet of snow across the state.

The post ‘We just do it’: Massachusetts plow drivers recount 24-hour shift during blizzard appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: 4 charged in alleged $7M pandemic relief fraud scheme
articles.description:
One Massachusetts man and three Florida residents are accused of submitting fraudulent pandemic relief applications and collecting kickbacks.

articles.description:

articles.title: Missing Weymouth man found dead after blizzard
articles.description:
Police say Brendan L. Rogers, 45, went missing Monday morning and no foul play is suspected.

articles.title: 68-year-old man pronounced dead after reported neighbor dispute in Middleborough
articles.description:

articles.description:

articles.title: Third victim reportedly dies after Pawtucket ice rink shooting
articles.description:
Gerald Dorgan, 75, died after being hospitalized in critical condition following the Feb. 16 shooting, according to reports.

articles.title: Cat saved after days stuck in a tree following the blizzard that blanketed Rhode Island
articles.description:
Matt Lyons said he climbed 40 to 50 feet to save Pixie, who was stuck up in a tree during Rhode Island's record snowstorm.

articles.title: Fire erupts at MCI-Norfolk prison, no major injuries reported
articles.description:
